pages.text: This Is A Passive Soul Shard, Which Cannot Be Used For Anything By Itself Besides From Creating Other Soul Shards. Right-Clicking Certain Mobs With A Passive Soul Shard Will Give You A New Soul Shard.
This Is A Player Soul Shard, Which Cannot Be Used For Anything By Itself Besides From Creating Other Soul Shards. Right-Clicking Certain Mobs With A Passive Soul Shard Will Give You A New Soul Shard.

This Is A Hostile Soul Shard, Which Can Either Be Used For Anything By Itself Besides From Creating Other Soul Shards, Or Can Also Be Used In Combination With A Totem Of Salvation, Which Grants You The Devilish Bargain Effect. Right-Clicking Certain Mobs With A Passive Soul Shard Will Give You A New Soul Shard.

This Is A Lightened Soul Shard, Which Can Be Obtained Via Using Any Hostile, Passive, Or Player Soul Shard On An Evoker. The Lightened Soul Shard Can Be Used In Combination With A Totem Of Salvation To Give You The Midas' Favour Effect.
This Is A Darkened Soul Shard, Which Can Be Obtained Via Using Any Hostile, Passive, Or Player Soul Shard On A Phantom.

This Is A Soul Fire Shard, Which Can Be Obtained Via Using Either A Darkened Or A Lightened Soul Shard On A Hoglin. The Soul Fire Shard Can Be Used In Combination With A Totem Of Salvation To Give Yourself THe Soul's Blessing Status Effect.

This Is A Disruptive Soul Shard, Which Can Be Obtained Via Using A Darkened Soul Shard On An Allay. Disruptive Soul Shards Can Be Used In Combination With A Totem Of Salvation To Give You The Siren's Warning Status Effect.

This Is An Angelic Soul Shard, Which Can Be Obtained Via Using A Lightened Soul Shard On A Drowned Zombie. Angelic Soul Shards Can Be Used In Combination With A Totem Of Salvation To Give You The Angelic Stiffness Status Effect.
